channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloudflare -- lol-html

item.title: CVE-2023-4241|2024-08-02T07:24:03.613Z -- cloudflare -- lol-html
item.description: lol-html can cause panics on certain HTML inputs. Anyone processing arbitrary 3rd party HTML with the library is affected.
